mean_en: a Christian ceremony in which a small amount of water is placed on a person\u0027s head or in which a person\u0027s body is briefly placed under water
sentence: Baptism is an important part of becoming a Christian.
sentence_trans: 洗礼是成为基督徒很重要的一部分。
word_etyma: bapt洗礼 + ism表名词...行为 → baptism洗礼
